doc.title: Inside Track: Refueling the Business of NASCAR
doc.plot: With slumping attendance at the Raceway, and advertisers' stickers appearing less on racing cars, Darren Rovell takes an inside look at the Business of NASCAR. In this doc you'll find interviews with Brian France of NASCAR, driver/owner Tony Stewart, visits to the Spint All-Star Race in Charlotte, NC and watch Tony Stewart's win at Pocono. You'll also get a peak at the fans of NASCAR both on the track, and in a super-fan's basement den.
